concept.title: Conversion Variable (eVar)
concept.shortdesc: The Custom Insight Conversion Variable (eVar) is placed in the Adobe code on selected web pages of your site. Its primary purpose is to segment conversion success metrics in custom marketing reports. eVar variables can be visit-based and can function similarly to cookies on the site. Values passed into eVar variables follow the user for a predetermined period of time, based on configurations made on the Settings tab.
